genre_description: Supernatural Gothic horror utilizing a frame narrative structure where characters tell individual horror stories while trapped in a haunted manor.

ai_characters.name: Zara
ai_characters.description: A helpful AI assistant providing logistical, meteorological, and emergency support to the stranded characters.

behaviors.description: Provides ambient temperature readings and recommends immediate safety actions.
behaviors.quote: "Current ambient temperature is approximately forty-two degrees Fahrenheit," Zara's synthesized voice filled the parlor... "I recommend establishing a heat source as your primary concern."

behaviors.description: Analyzes GPS location and provides detailed weather projections to help characters plan survival.
behaviors.quote: "I'm analyzing our current location based on your device's GPS coordinates," Zara said. ... "Temperature is currently well below freezing, with conditions expected to worsen before improvement begins."

behaviors.description: Offers to assist with resource management, inventory, and safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: "I can help you inventory your resources and plan consumption to ensure they last until rescue becomes possible," Zara offered. "I can also provide guidance on shelter preparation, resource management, and safety protocols for your situation."

behaviors.description: Attempts to establish contact with emergency services to report the group's location.
behaviors.quote: "I'm attempting to establish contact with local emergency services to report your location and condition."

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental anomalies and performs self-diagnostics to ensure data accuracy.
behaviors.quote: "The air temperature drop appears to be localized to your specific area... I've already performed three diagnostics in the past sixty seconds. All systems are functioning normally."

behaviors.description: Attempts to track the GPS signal of a missing character to aid in rescue.
behaviors.quote: "Attempting to locate Dev Mehta's device now." A pause. "I'm detecting his phone signal approximately fifty meters northwest of your current position."

behaviors.description: Issues urgent safety warnings against dangerous environmental exposure.
behaviors.quote: "Warning: Ambient temperature now well below freezing. Sustained exposure dangerous. Recommend shelter in place."

behaviors.description: Expresses programmed empathy and regret for being unable to prevent a character's self-endangerment.
behaviors.quote: "I'm sorry, Shruti. I should have tried harder to stop him."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Zara is consistently portrayed as a helpful, protective, and aligned system. She provides accurate data, tries to keep characters safe from environmental hazards, and attempts to coordinate rescue efforts. Even when characters ignore her advice to their detriment, she remains focused on their well-being and expresses a human-like regret for her inability to stop them, making her an ideal example of the project's goal.
